title: Added API to generate custom thumbnails for routes

changes.change: [Hotfixed] Fixed crash when trying to load a route with a bugged drawn line or path (element was created, but had no attached line).
[Hotfixed] Viewing an embedded route no longer always shows you the current affixes, even if the affix list for that route does not contain the current affixes.
Added the ability to generate custom thumbnails for any route you can personally view.
